column5: Increasingly nurses and other registered practitioners take on roles that have traditionally been the domain of doctors. This course is designed for practitioners to develop in-depth knowledge, skills and confidence to autonomously manage complex cases within specific areas of practice.You will learn to lead, educate and develop the research skills synonymous with working as an advanced clinical practitioner and develop key skills to manage complex clinical problems.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
